material.mattext: What does "FttX" stand for in telecommunication systems?
What is the primary advantage of FttX technology over traditional copper-based networks?
Which organization develops and maintains the standards for FttX technology?
Which of the following is an advantage of FttH (Fiber-to-the-Home) over other FttX architectures?
Which type of fiber optic cable is commonly used in FttX deployments?
Which of the following is a disadvantage of FttX technology?
Which of the following is a benefit of FttX technology for service providers?
What is the typical lifespan of the fiber optic cables used in FttX deployments?
Which technology is used to mitigate signal loss in long-distance FttX deployments?
What is the primary advantage of FttX technology for end-users?
Which factor affects the speed and performance of FttX technology the most?
Distance between the customer and the network access point
Type of fiber optic cable used
Availability of electrical power at the customer's premises
Which of the following is a disadvantage of using multi-mode fiber in FttX deployments?
Which factor makes FttX technology more resilient to electromagnetic interference compared to copper-based networks?
